product_name: Harmony BTS Rudder Kit for Rudder Ready Kayaks
long_description: The Harmony BTS Rudder Kit for Rudder Ready Kayaks increases the control and efficiency of the Wilderness Systems Tarpon, Tsunami and Tarpon Ultralites as well as the Perception Essence series kayaks.
short_description: The Harmony BTS Rudder Kit for Rudder Ready Kayaks increases the control and efficiency of the Wilderness Systems Tarpon, Tsunami and Tarpon Ultralites as well as the Perception Essence series kayaks.
